title: Did patch 5.17 give anyone else's computer aids?
body: I'm not sure if it's the patch at all but ever since updating this morning, my computer has been running like I run IRL, very slow.

replies.body: My computer had a heart attack 3 times last game. I cri everytiem ;_;
I have had some very strange system crashes.
So have I! Usually only while browsing client or in champ select
iv had game crashes wont log in but I don't mind cos im getting a new pc in a week lol il just sell it with bugs xD
When the nexus dies my screen freezes for about 2 seconds, but that's really the only issue I've had.

> [{quoted}](name=Knee High Socks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mtkl39Gh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-02T07:30:13.719+0000)
>
> When the nexus dies my screen freezes for about 2 seconds, but that's really the only issue I've had.

I have this problem when it is patch 5.16

Lucky it's not running like I run IRL cause then it wouldn't be running at all ðŸ˜‚
I'm not sure cause I haven't been home to update but I'll let you know if I notice a change when I do!
